text: Gilze en Rijen is a municipality in the Dutch province of North Brabant. In 2019, 26,431 people lived there. On 25 July 2019, the Dutch national heat record was broken here. https://www.knmi.nl/over-het-knmi/nieuws/temperatuur- door-historische-grens-van-40-c ==References== Category:Municipalities of North Brabant
title: Gilze en Rijen
